articles.author: Leana S. Wen
articles.title: Opinion | RFK Jr.’s attacks on vaccines just hit a wall of pediatricians - The Washington Post
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics issuing its own vaccine guidance is not just symbolic.
articles.content: It should not be newsworthy for the American Academy of Pediatrics to issue vaccine recommendations, as it did last week. The organization, which represents about 67,000 pediatricians, has done so ev… [+70 chars]
